spec_data.Name: perl-Convert-Color
spec_data.Description:
This module provides conversions between commonly used ways to express
colors. It provides conversions between color spaces such as RGB and HSV,
and it provides ways to look up colors by a name.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 09:48:08 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Color space conversions and named lookups
